document.full_text: corrections officers firing pepper spray and plastic rounds quelled a "large-scale riot" by about 150 inmates on friday at the maximum-security california state prison at sacramento, prison officials said.
document.title: two inmates badly stabbed in california prison riot
lines_and_colors: corrections officers firing pepper spray and plastic rounds quelled a "large-scale riot" by about 150 inmates on friday at the maximum-security california state prison at sacramento, prison officials said.
